{"job_id":"88407745","listing_id":"88407745","job_status":"Active","job_title":"Store Manager","job_summary":"Our client Heytea is seeking a Store Manager to join their team!","job_ad_details":"

Our client Heytea is seeking a Store Manager to join their team!


Are you passionate about leading a dynamic team in the beverage industry? Join our client's fruit tea and milk tea shop as a Store Manager and take your career to the next level! This role offers an exciting opportunity to oversee daily operations, drive sales performance, and create a positive team culture in a fast-paced environment.


What you'll be doing?

  • Lead daily operations: Oversee all aspects of the store's day-to-day activities, ensuring smooth and efficient service.

  • Maintain hygiene standards: Uphold the highest levels of cleanliness and food safety throughout the store.

  • Implement SOPs: Ensure strict compliance with Standard Operating Procedures to maintain consistency and quality.

  • Drive sales performance: Develop and execute strategies to increase revenue and meet business targets.

  • Build a strong team: Foster a cooperative and positive team culture, motivating staff to deliver excellent customer service.


Who are they looking for?

  • Educational background: Candidates with SPM or above qualifications are encouraged to apply.

  • Industry experience: At least 2 years of experience in the F&B industry, demonstrating growth and leadership potential.

  • Language skills: Proficiency in Malay and English to effectively communicate with customers and team members.

  • Leadership qualities: Strong ability to motivate, train, and manage a team in a fast-paced environment.

  • Customer-focused: Passionate about delivering exceptional customer experiences and building customer loyalty.


Why you should consider this opportunity?

Our client offers an attractive remuneration package and other benefits, such as:

  • Attendance allowance of RM100

  • Annual leave

  • Opportunity for career advancement in a growing industry


How to apply

Ready to join this role? Click Apply now to submit your resume and share your availability and expected salary with us!

We value diversity and encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply for this exciting opportunity.

All information received will be kept strictly confidential and will be used only for employment-related purposes.

#AI-Test-Harness

{"id":1501954,"candidateWrittenSummary":"

Dynamic and results-oriented leader with over 10 years of experience in operations management, sales strategy, and team leadership across multiple industries including security, food delivery, and hospitality. Proven expertise in driving business growth, managing large teams, and building strong client relationships. Adept at improving operational efficiency, implementing innovative solutions, and leading organizations through growth and transformation. Recognized for strong communication, strategic thinking, and people management skills that consistently deliver measurable results.

","employment":"

Branch Manager

Safeguards Secure Solution Sdn. Bhd. | May 2024 - July 2025

  • Lead operations for the Sibu branch, managing 60+ security staff and overseeing 15+ client accounts.
  • Implemented branch-wide strategies that improved client satisfaction by 25% and reduced service complaints by 30% within the first year.
  • Optimized deployment schedules, cutting overtime costs by 15% without reducing service quality.
  • Expanded regional market presence, securing 5 new corporate contracts worth RM2.5M in annual revenue.

Regional Sales Manager

Foodpanda Malaysia | December 2019 - January 2024

  • Directed sales operations across multiple regions, leading a team of 40+ sales representatives.
  • Consistently exceeded sales targets, delivering 18–22% year-on-year revenue growth.
  • Onboarded 200+ new restaurant partners annually, expanding Foodpanda's market share in secondary cities.
  • Improved sales team productivity by 35% through structured training and data-driven performance reviews.
  • Built and maintained relationships with key accounts generating RM15M+ in annual sales.

Restaurant General Manager

McDonald's Malaysia | January 2017 - December 2019

  • Managed daily operations of a flagship outlet with 50+ staff and an average of 1,500 daily customers.
  • Increased annual revenue by 20% while maintaining profit margins above corporate benchmarks.
  • Reduced staff turnover by 15% through improved training and development programs.
  • Ensured strict compliance with health and safety standards, achieving 100% audit compliance.

Teacher

Lembaga Zakat Negeri Kedah | January 2013 - May 2014

  • Taught and mentored 200+ students, achieving a 90% pass rate in core subjects.
  • Designed and implemented student engagement programs that improved attendance by 20%.
  • Organized school-community initiatives that increased parental participation in education activities by 40%.
","education":"

Diploma in Diploma of Teaching

Open University Malaysia | Completed in 2025

Bachelor in Bachelor of Business Studies

University Malaysia | Completed in 2017

Diploma in Diploma in Accounting

MARA Polytechnic College Kota Bharu & College Poly-Tech MARA | Completed in 2013

{"job_id":"88390581","listing_id":"88390581","job_status":"Active","job_title":"Technical Support Engineer","job_summary":"Our client SECIRON (MALAYSIA) SDN. BHD. is seeking a Technical Support Engineer to join their team!","job_ad_details":"

Our client SECIRON (MALAYSIA) SDN. BHD. is seeking a Technical Support Engineer to join their team!

Joining SECIRON (MALAYSIA) SDN. BHD. as a Technical Support Engineer offers you the chance to kickstart your career in a dynamic, high-tech environment. You'll be at the forefront of providing technical support, troubleshooting issues, and enhancing customer satisfaction. This role is perfect for those eager to make a real impact and grow in their field.


About Our Client

SECIRON (MALAYSIA) SDN. BHD. is a leading company in the cybersecurity sector, dedicated to providing innovative solutions to protect businesses from digital threats. With a commitment to excellence and a forward-thinking approach, SecIron is a great place to grow your career.


What you'll be doing?

  • Provide Support: Assist customers through various channels, ensuring their technical issues are resolved efficiently.

  • Execute Tests: Conduct compatibility tests and document findings to improve our support services.

  • Diagnose Issues: Work with customers to understand and resolve their technical concerns, escalating complex issues as needed.

  • Maintain Records: Keep detailed logs of customer interactions and issue resolutions to ensure continuity and accuracy.

  • Escalate Issues: Forward unresolved or complex issues to specialized teams for further investigation.

  • Enhance Knowledge: Develop and update support documentation to help both customers and team members.

  • Improve Products: Identify opportunities to enhance product reliability and usability based on customer feedback.

  • Stay Updated: Keep abreast of industry trends and best practices to provide the best support possible.


Who are they looking for?

  • Educational Background: A degree in IT, Computer Science, or related fields is preferred, but candidates with no prior experience are welcomed to apply.

  • Experience: 2-5 years of experience in troubleshooting software, hardware, and network issues.

  • Skills: Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to communicate technical concepts effectively.

  • Language Proficiency: Excellent written and verbal English skills are essential, with an advantage for those who understand Mandarin.


Why should you consider this opportunity?

Our client offers an attractive remuneration package and other benefits, such as:

  • Performance bonus

  • Transportation Allowance

  • ⁠⁠Dental / Optical Allowance

  • Handphone Allowance

  • Annual leave


How to apply

Ready to join this role? Click Apply now to submit your resume and share your availability and expected salary with us!

Your unique skills and experiences are what make you stand out. We encourage everyone who meets the basic qualifications to apply.

All information received will be kept strictly confidential and will be used only for employment-related purposes.

#AI-Test-Harness

{"id":1501962,"candidateWrittenSummary":"

This application of resume is for one of the post of your company. I believe that my qualification and working experience enable me to contribute a good performance in your organization also to gain new experience and learn new things in order to enhance my ability in various field. I'm a young professional with expertise in data manipulation with niche market on ASEAN consumerism. Am also experienced in dealing with client and end user customer. Enjoying learning new things and can assimilate new ideas quickly.

","employment":"

Client Service Associate, Asset Management

Capital Dynamics | Sept 2023 - Sept 2024

  • Resolve constant flow of clients' enquiries and feedback in a timely, professional and efficient manner (Call, Walk-In, Email, Whatsapp)
  • Increased team efficiency by developing streamlined processes for client communication and account management. (Different investment product knowledge and learning exposure)
  • Assisted in the retention of high-value clients through proactive communication and exceptional service delivery. (IMA, Unit trust and public listed - closed-end fund and etc)
  • Assist with on-boarding of investors and e-KYC review/check (Onfido e-KYC)
  • Liaise with the fund administration team and other internal departments to ensure proper procedures and documentation on matters related to clients' transactions. (Withdrawal, account checking, dividend return policy (DRP), cooling-off procedure and etc)
  • Establish rapport and long-term relationships with clients (Following up call and latest events sharing)
  • Work closely with the Marketing Team in assisting post event activities.
  • Set up and maintaining investor records in CRM (Bigin, Excel based weekly report progression)
  • Work with IT on building up knowledge based (KB like Zendesk but using in-house platformed), maintaining and updating the knowledge base platform with latest information update
  • Assist in building up new processes and suggesting enhancements. (SOP and P&P)
  • Talent Acquisition (involving in interviewing new candidates for Operation and Client Servicing, feedback to the management for suitable candidates, involving in Job Fair in Point university for potential candidates hiring and etc)
  • Adaptability and Flexibility Manage and involved in company's roadshow, events and Investor day (being the committee members, mingling around with the investors and also potential clients, assisting with new onboarding process during the event)
  • Team Collaboration
  • Beginner user of Visual basic software, Adobe Photoshop and Phyton Programming.
  • Troubleshooting Software and Hardware

Assistant Technical Customer Service Specialist

TDCX (MY) SDN. BHD | Sept 2022 - Sept 2023

  • Razer Project
  • Improved customer satisfaction by addressing and resolving gaming product service-related (Razer software and hardware products, services issue will be escalated) issues promptly and professionally, through chats and email
  • Outbound Calling
  • Customer Support
  • Collaborated with team members to develop new strategies for improving service quality and efficiency.
  • On going knowledge based (KB) and Flash learning test and New Product Introduction (NPI)
  • Implemented new procedures to reduce wait times and increase customer satisfaction rates in busy service environments.
  • Handled escalated customer concerns with professionalism, resulting in improved relationships and repeat business, return merchandise authorization procedure (RMA) covering USA, Asia Pacific, Europe and other country regions.
  • Malay, English - Proficient
  • Maintained accurate records of all customer interactions for reporting purposes and ongoing process improvements (Oracle).
  • Actively listened to customers, handled concerns quickly and escalated major issues to the team lead (One time exception (OTE) process and others)
  • Offering advice and assistance to customers, paying attention to special needs or wants.
  • Responded to customer requests for products, services, and company information (knowledge based research).
  • Participated in team meetings and training sessions to stay informed about product updates and changes (Quality Assurance, KPI and so on).
  • Utilized customer service software to manage interactions and track customer satisfaction (Oracle and Nexus)

Client Servicing and Data Assurance Executive

Dattel Sdn. Bhd | Jan 2017 - June 2020

  • Streamlined the client onboarding process for a more efficient and seamless experience.
  • Developed long-lasting relationships with clients by maintaining regular communication and offering personalized solutions.
  • Resolved complex client issues, resulting in increased retention rates and positive feedback.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products and services to clients (liaising with the IT, Operation and Account team for any issues related to the client (Apps, Quotation, Data, Programming of QNR, rate card for project)
  • Work on Political and External Client Survey Project using Dattel Platform and Apps.
  • Monitoring and Supervised FDA (Field Data Associate) on site when they gather the data on a monthly basis
  • Monthly and weekly data cleaning and reporting for Political and External Clients surveys.
  • Programming the questionnaire and logic into the Dattel Apps system.
  • Monthly catch up with client / whenever necessary if there is any new requirement needed for the application.
  • Supervise Quality Assurance Team in analyzing the result of the interview and provides reporting to client
  • Basic Python programming learning
  • Jira Timeline and Plans

System Specialist

SOLV Baker Hughes | Jan 2016 - Dec 2016

  • Enhanced system efficiency by optimizing software configurations and hardware installations.
  • Implemented security measures for safeguarding sensitive data and preventing unauthorized access. (VPN troubleshooting)
  • Streamlined IT processes with the integration of cutting-edge technologies and automation tools.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop innovative solutions for complex technical issues. (work with on site desktop team for any hardware issue that were unable to resolved remotely)
  • Reduced downtime by proactively identifying potential system vulnerabilities and addressing them promptly.
  • Troubleshoot critical issues swiftly, maintaining a consistently high level of system performance and reliability.
  • Provided exceptional support services to internal stakeholders by resolving technical issues quickly and accurately.
  • Set up hardware and software in optimal configurations to meet network performance requirements. (Granting and controlling administrator access)
  • Improved overall user experience through support, training, troubleshooting, improvements and communication of system changes.
","education":"

Diploma In Mechanical Engineering

{"job_id":"88407819","listing_id":"88407819","job_status":"Active","job_title":"Site Engineer (Metal and Steel Construction)","job_summary":"Our client is seeking a Site Engineer to join their team!","job_ad_details":"

Our client is seeking a Site Engineer to join their team!

Take charge of exciting construction projects in the Tengah West Region where your engineering expertise will ensure successful project delivery from start to finish. This role offers the perfect opportunity to apply your technical skills in a hands-on environment while working with a leading construction firm known for innovation, sustainability, and excellence.


Other Information:

  • Working Day: 5.5 days

  • Working Timing: 9am-6pm; 9am-1pm

  • Working Location: Tengah area

  • Salary Range: $4,000-$5,000


About Our Client

Our client is a leading construction firm with a reputation for delivering high-quality, innovative projects across Singapore. Their mission is to push the boundaries of what's possible in the industry, while maintaining a strong focus on sustainability, safety, and community engagement. Join their team and be part of shaping the future of construction.


What you'll be doing?

• Site Operations Management - Oversee day-to-day construction site operations, supervising activities, monitoring progress, and proactively identifying and resolving issues to keep projects on track

• Quality Assurance - Ensure all construction work meets project plans, specifications, and safety regulations while maintaining the highest standards of workmanship

• Progress Monitoring - Conduct thorough site inspections, perform quality checks, and maintain detailed documentation of project progress for stakeholder reporting

• Stakeholder Coordination - Liaise effectively with clients, subcontractors, and other stakeholders to coordinate activities, address concerns, and maintain smooth project communications

• Technical Leadership - Provide expert technical support and guidance to construction teams, helping them overcome challenges and achieve project objectives

• Documentation Management - Assist in preparing comprehensive project reports, documentation, and records that ensure compliance and facilitate project success


Who are they looking for?

• Educational Foundation - Degree in Civil Engineering or related field, providing you with the technical knowledge essential for construction project success

• Professional Experience - Minimum 3 years of experience as a Site Engineer or similar role within the construction industry, bringing proven expertise to drive project excellence

• Problem-solving Excellence - Outstanding problem-solving and decision-making skills that enable you to navigate complex construction challenges effectively

• Quality Focus - Strong attention to detail with an unwavering commitment to quality and safety standards across all project activities

• Collaborative Approach - Ability to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams, fostering positive relationships and achieving shared objectives

• Technical Proficiency - Strong skills in reading and interpreting construction plans, drawings, and specifications with accuracy and precision

• Technology Skills - Experience with project management software and construction site management tools that enhance productivity and project tracking


Why you should consider this opportunity?

Our client offers an attractive remuneration package and other benefits, such as:

• Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package that recognizes your valuable contributions

• Exciting variety of projects that will challenge and develop your engineering expertise

• Ongoing training and development programs to support your professional growth and career advancement

• Flexible work arrangements that prioritize work-life balance and personal wellbeing

• Clear opportunities for career progression within a growing and innovative construction company


How to apply

Ready to join this role? Click Apply now to submit your resume and share your availability and expected salary with us!

We welcome applications from all engineering professionals who are passionate about construction and committed to delivering excellence.

All information received will be kept strictly confidential and will be used only for employment-related purposes.


Jobs DB Singapore Pte Ltd | 24C2640

Lim Jun Yao | R25129737

{"id":1501718,"candidateWrittenSummary":"

A self-motivated, quick-learning, and hardworking Civil Engineer with more than 4 years of experience in Construction Projects in Sri Lanka and UAE. To work in challenging environments as a team worker. I mostly rely on self learning and best practices. To reach my fullest potential as dynamic professional while adding value to the organization in every possible aspect.

","employment":"

Planning Engineer

Prestige Constructions LLC | August 2023 - September 2025

  • Regularly Updated and monitored project progress and schedules using Primavera P6 to ensure alignment with project timelines and milestones.
  • Assisted the Project Manager in coordinating, scheduling, and planning project activities to ensure effective work implementation.
  • Generated project critical activity lists and other need-based reports (Weekly Progress Report and Monthly Progress Report).
  • Monitoring work progress and evaluating schedule and cost performance.
  • Creating and maintaining a 2-week look-ahead program to anticipate and plan upcoming tasks.
  • Inspecting periodically the work performed, improving quality and rectification where necessary.
  • Tracking the procurement as per the requirement for construction.
  • Support the preparation of RFI for design clarifications from consultants.
  • Liaised with subcontractors to obtain work clearances and maintained accurate clearance documentation in compliance with company standards.
  • Prepared schedules for authority approvals, coordinated with the management team on authority submission processes, and ensured accurate documentation and record-keeping for all authority approvals.
  • Coordination with the engineering team to ascertain the availability of deliverable material on time for construction activities.
  • Coordinate with site engineers and the management team to ensure work is completed as per the project schedule.
  • Participating in internal and external meetings to communicate project progress and requirements effectively.

Project Engineer

K.D.Ebert and Sons Holdings (Pvt) Ltd. | May 2022 - June 2023

  • Review of project documentation including drawings, and specifications to ensure accuracy and completeness.
  • Ensuring that work is completed as per the project schedule and in accordance with the approved drawings.
  • Coordination with the engineering team to ascertain the availability of deliverable material on time for construction activities.
  • Preparation and submission of progress claims, variation orders, and site progress reports.
  • Conducted regular inspections and assess the work performance done by all subcontractors.
  • Prepared bar bending schedules and Rebar assembling work.
  • Engaged with the structural works such as Retaining wall, Drainage constructions and Road work including embankment, sub base, ABC, shoulder laying, priming, asphalt laying and road marking works.
  • Preparation of S-Curves for planned vs. achieved targets and analysis of slippage in targeted works.
  • Maintain and update daily and monthly site records including work progress, tests, safety, material, and manpower.
  • Prepare weekly, monthly progress reports and carryout necessary documentations on a daily basis.

Site Engineer

Central Engineering Services PVT.LTD | August 2021 - February 2022

  • Review of project documentation including Drawing, Specifications and ensure all structural / finishing works are carried out according to approved drawings & method of statement.
  • Conduct regular inspections and assess the work performance of all subcontractors.
  • Preparation of bar schedules and rebar assembling works setting out works for structural elements with the drawing and specifications.
  • Monitor Reinforcement work, Form work, Block work, Concreting, plastering and Tiling works.
  • Supervised Honeycomb rectification, Crack monitoring, Chemical anchoring, and Waterproofing works as per approved specifications.
  • Assist in preparing work schedules and monitor daily and weekly progress against the project schedule.
  • Prepare weekly, monthly progress reports and carryout necessary documentations on a daily basis.
  • Maintain daily site records, work progress reports, and test reports.
  • Implement and follow all safety guidelines and site rules.

{"job_id":"88136295","listing_id":"88136295","job_status":"Active","job_title":"PROJECT MANAGEMENT OFFICE (PMO)","job_summary":"Our client \"SHUANGFEI WIRE HARNESS SDN. BHD.\" is seeking a Project Management Office (PMO) to join their team!","job_ad_details":"

Our client \"SHUANGFEI WIRE HARNESS SDN. BHD.\" is seeking a Project Management Office (PMO) to join their team!

Take charge of exciting project initiatives in a dynamic manufacturing environment where you'll play a pivotal role in driving new product development, process implementation, and customer satisfaction. This position offers exceptional opportunities to work with cross-functional teams, lead quality processes, and directly report to senior management while contributing to the company's strategic growth. You'll be at the forefront of automotive manufacturing excellence, managing complex projects from conception to completion while ensuring adherence to international quality standards.


What you'll be doing?

  • Project Leadership: Take full responsibility for scheduling, planning, coordinating and monitoring assigned projects to ensure successful completion within timeline and budget.

  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Serve as a key team member engaging in new product development, project transfers and manufacturing process implementation aligned with business strategy.

  • Resource Planning: Plan comprehensive project requirements covering the 4M framework (Man, Method, Machine, Material) for optimal resource allocation.

  • Risk Management: Proactively identify potential project risks and establish effective mitigation plans to ensure project success and minimize disruptions.

  • Quality Process Leadership: Lead critical automotive quality processes including CP, FMEA, APQP and quality history reviews to maintain industry standards.

  • Customer Relationship Management: Handle customer change requests, organize meetings and provide clear explanations for project modifications to maintain strong partnerships.

  • Documentation Management: Oversee approval processes for PSW, PPAP, APQP, TA and other essential project documentation.

  • Audit Coordination: Coordinate customer development process audits and ensure timely closure of all open issues for compliance excellence.

  • Progress Reporting: Prepare comprehensive reports and present project progress updates to customers and internal stakeholders.

  • Authority & Decision Making: Exercise authority to halt activities that compromise customer or product requirements during any project phase.


Who are they looking for?

  • Educational Background: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or equivalent to provide strong technical knowledge for complex project management.

  • Professional Experience: At least 2 years of relevant working experience in project management or related engineering fields. Candidates with no prior experience are welcomed to apply.

  • Language Skills: Fluent in Mandarin (speaking, writing and reading) to communicate effectively with Mandarin-speaking stakeholders and customers.

  • Technical Proficiency: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), CATIA and AutoCAD for technical documentation and design work.

  • Quality Standards Knowledge: Experience with ISO 9001:2015/IATF 16949:2016 requirements and completion of 5 Core tools training preferred.

  • Project Management Skills: Strong project management and supervision skills with ability to handle multiple discipline projects simultaneously.

  • Analytical Abilities: Excellent analytical skills for conducting feasibility studies and managing customer and internal changes effectively.

  • Travel Flexibility: Willingness to travel as required for customer meetings, audits and project coordination activities.


Why you should consider this opportunity?

Our client offers an attractive remuneration package and other benefits, such as:

  • Convenient free car parking

  • Generous 12 days annual leave plus medical leave

  • EPF, SOCSO and PCB contributions

  • Performance-based bonus opportunities

  • Clear career advancement roadmap

  • Travel allowance with mileage claims

  • Medical benefits through panel clinic access

  • Additional RM250 optical benefit


Working Arrangement:

  • Monday to Friday, 8:30am - 6:00pm


How to apply

Ready to join this role? Click Apply now to submit your resume and share your availability and expected salary with us!

We encourage applications from motivated professionals who thrive in challenging project environments and are passionate about delivering excellence.

All information received will be kept strictly confidential and will be used only for employment-related purposes.

{"id":1501719,"candidateWrittenSummary":"

Dynamic and detail-oriented training professional with strong experience in designing and delivering impactful training programs across healthcare and IT sectors. Skilled in developing training materials, conducting onboarding sessions, and facilitating in-person and online training for diverse audiences, including government agencies and internal teams. Proven track record in effectively managing training activities, collaborating with internal and external stakeholders, and ensuring compliance with organizational standards. Strong leadership abilities, strategic planning skills, and cross-functional collaboration experience. Ready to leverage expertise to excel as a Senior Training Executive, driving growth and operational excellence.

","employment":"

Research & Training Executive

Mahsa Specialist Hospital | Jan 2025 - Present

  • Develop, plan & design training programs and courses to be marketed and sold to external clients.
  • Coordinate with subject matter experts, trainers, and partners to design relevant and high-quality course content.
  • Manage HRD Corp registration for programs and trainers to ensure eligibility for HRD claimable status.
  • Liaise with internal teams and external stakeholders to organize and implement training sessions.
  • Handle participants registration, communication, and post-training evaluation.
  • Identify and develop new business opportunities for training programs and services.
  • Plan and execute strategies to promote and sell training courses to external clients, corporate organizations, and government agencies.
  • Develop and implement marketing plans to achieve business growth targets.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients.
  • Engage with vendors for the CME events and HealWell Expo 2025.
  • Ensure excellent customer service and follow-up to maintain long-term partnerships.
  • Track and monitor training attendance and client satisfaction.
  • Manage the department's daily schedule, including arranging internal and external meetings, coordinating department activities, and supporting administrative operations.
  • Handle documentation, correspondence, and other administrative tasks to ensure smooth workflow and effective communication within the department.
  • Assist in filing, record keeping, and preparation of reports or presentation materials.
  • Oversee the planning, scheduling, and execution of training sessions and workshops.
  • Manage logistics, participant registrations, and communication with the trainers and clients.
  • Ensure smooth implementation and evaluate post-training feedback for continuous improvement.
  • Manage and lead the big event of the hospital, HEALWELL EXPO 2025.

Training Executive

Bestinet | Sep 2022 - Dec 2024

  • Coordinating Training Bills: Collaborating with the Finance department to arrange billing and payments for training courses with external training providers.
  • Onboarding Program Development: Developing onboarding programs for new employees to ensure their smooth integration into the company.
  • Training Course Design: Designing training courses and programs tailored to meet specific training needs of both internal staff and external customers.
  • Training Delivery: Delivered comprehensive training sessions to internal staff and government agencies through both in-person and webinar formats, ensuring effective knowledge transfer and user understanding.
  • Creation Of Training Materials: Preparing user manuals for the company's products and developing learning materials for various training programs.

Wellness Executive

Sunway Medical Center | May 2017 - Sep 2022

  • Administrative Support: Assisted HOD in handling health screening inquiries, Guarantee Letters of Corporate Clients, monthly Financial & Statistics Reports.
  • Team Leadership: Led the team effectively to ensure smooth day-to-day operations within the department, provided guidance to team members.
  • Project Collaboration: Collaborated with other departments within Sunway Medical Center, particularly on health projects, for seamless integration.

Chartering Assistant

Dinastia Jati Sdn Bhd | Oct 2016 - Apr 2017

  • Document Preparation: Prepared invoicing & tendering documents, Invitation to Bid (ITB), Technical Clarification & Request for Quotation (RFQ) documentation.
  • Vessel Chartering: Negotiated contracts, coordinated vessel operations, ensured the profitable employment of managed/operated vessels.
  • Assistance To Group Executive Director: Provided support to Group Executive Director & Contract department in commercial & contract management.

{"job_id":"88359282","listing_id":"88359282","job_status":"Active","job_title":"Customer - Representative (Yoga / Fitness Centre)","job_summary":"Our client \"PURE International (Hong Kong) Ltd\" is seeking a Customer Representative (Yoga Centre) to join their team!\n\n","job_ad_details":"

Our client \"PURE International (Hong Kong) Ltd\" is seeking a Customer Representative (Yoga Centre) to join their team!


What you'll be doing?

  • Build relationships: Develop and maintain strong connections with new and existing customers to achieve sales and service objectives.

  • Drive sales growth: Identify new sales and business opportunities to expand the centre's customer base.

  • Provide excellent service: Look after customer service and member retention, ensuring a positive experience for all clients.

Who are they looking for?

  • Service-oriented: You have a \"go-get-it\" attitude and are committed to providing exceptional customer experiences.

  • Self-motivated: You are sales-driven and can work independently to achieve targets.

  • Passionate about wellness: You are highly enthusiastic and energetic, with a keen interest in healthy lifestyles.

  • Strong communicator: You possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills to engage effectively with clients.

  • Language skills: You have a good command of Cantonese and English, which are essential for interacting with our diverse clientele.

  • Industry knowledge: Experience in the fitness/yoga industry is beneficial but not required. Candidates with no prior experience are welcomed to apply.

Why you should consider this opportunity?

Our client offers an attractive remuneration package and other benefits, such as:

  • Comprehensive medical benefits

  • Annual leave

  • Free club usage for personal fitness

  • Exclusive staff discounts

  • Friends and family discounts

How to apply

Ready to join this role? Click Apply now to submit your resume and share your availability and expected salary with us!

We value diversity and encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply for this exciting opportunity.

All information received will be kept strictly confidential and will be used only for employment-related purposes.

Refer A Candidate and Earn $2,000 (Click this link to share referral details via Email)The Jobsdb SmartReward Program is applicable to this job opening. Applicants who successfully secure this job or refer a successful candidate, will receive the SmartReward as advertised. *By applying to or referring a candidate to this job, you agree to the Jobsdb SmartReward Program - Terms & Conditions
